BIO

I am currently a 5th semester Honours Bachelor of Technology - Software Development student at Seneca. I have a high level of interest in website development. Through the first four semesters, I was assigned numerous group assignments and projects. I have always taken the role of the group leader and successfully motivated the group to finish all projects on time using C, C++, JAVA, SQL. I have experience using HTML, CSS, node.js, Angular, React.
